title: Miley Cyrus and boyfriend Cody Simpson perfectly in sync for TikTok dance routine
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson proved they are just like us as they spent their evening perfecting a synchronised dance routine.

And we’re slightly obsessed.

Taking to TikTok, the We Can’t Stop singer shared a very brief clip of herself and her new 22-year-old boyfriend as they messed around in front of the camera in the bathroom, dancing to STUPID by Ashnikko featuring Yung Baby Tate.

Side note: A total banger.

The 26-year-old rocked a black bra and shorts as she jumped up and down while waving her arms, still managing to look pretty damn cool.

Advertisement

Advertisement

While the La Da Dee singer opted for a black Harley Davidson t-shirt and shorts for the video.

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson showed off their dancing talent on TikTok (Picture: TikTok)

They were perfectly in sync in the clip (Picture: TikTok)

They were perfectly in sync for the routine, putting our playground dances to absolute shame.

Mody (or Ciley?) have barely been apart since they went public with their relationship at the beginning of the month.

In fact, just hours before they blessed us all with the clip, the lovebirds were spotted out in LA, enjoying a casual lunch.

The pair started dating earlier this month (Picture: Backgrid)

Miley recently split with Liam Hemsworth (Picture: Backgrid)

Miley recently confirmed her split from husband Liam Hemsworth after a 10-year on-off relationship.

Very shortly after their brief marriage came to an end, the Don’t Call Me Angel singer made headlines after she was spotted kissing Kaitlynn Carter, on a trip to Italy.

And an insider has now claimed the Hunger Games actor’s mum is ‘relieved’ their romance has come to an end.

Miley and Liam got married back in December (Picture: Rex)

‘Liam really felt he needed his family after the break-up,’ a source told HollywoodLife. ‘They are very, very close.

‘His mum is feeling so relieved that Liam made the decision to end the relationship as his entire family, but her especially, always struggled approving Miley.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘[Liam] really struggled with the break-up and is going to be cautious and slow heading into the next relationship.’

Maybe not that ‘cautious and slow’ as he was recently seen passionately kissing rumoured new girlfriend Maddison Brown on a night out in New York…

description: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson proved they are just like us as they spent their evening perfecting a synchronised dance routine on TikTok
